agentAbility.name: EMP Rakete
agentAbility.description: Blitz loads a slow-moving missile into the gun of his vehicle. The missile can jam nearby opponents, and has detection capabilities that slow it down while it is close proximity of an enemy vehicle. The missile detonates with a delay shortly after coming into contact with an obstacle, or can be manually triggered, creating a large explosion.

primaryAttack.name: Autocannon
primaryAttack.description: Fires large-caliber armor-piercing rounds capable of piercing lightly armored vehicles.

tankAbilities.name: TOW ATGM
tankAbilities.description: Fires up to 2 tube launched, optically tracked, wire-guided missiles with excellent anti-armor capabilities.

tankAbilities.name: Smoke Launchers
tankAbilities.description: Deploy a smoke screen in front of the vehicle to obscure enemy vision.
